passage_text: Jaden Smith and Sarah Snyder Cuddling. Jaden Smith has been spotted getting cozy with new girlfriend Sarah Snyder at Gypsy Sport’s Spring Show on Tuesday, E! Online reports. Jaden Smith, 17, and Sarah Snyder, 19, were sitting front row at the fashion show, where they were seen indulging in some major PDA.

She's been spotlighted as Jaden Smith's glamorous new girlfriend and now mingles with Hollywood's A-list. But Sarah Snyder, the woman seen smooching Will Smith's son during New York Fashion Week, is raising eyebrows for other reasons.

On Tuesday, the 17-year-old attended the Gypsy Sport runway show at New York Fashion Week with his new girlfriend, Sarah Snyder. Jaden and the 19-year-old model kept close, cozying up to each other and even sneaking in a kiss.
